question: I am a 45 year old male who is a borderline diabetic according to my doctor.  Diabetes does run in the family, as well as cancer.  Over the last week I have noticed that I have a twitch over the upper portion off my left lip or lower left cheek.  The twitch will last for about 3-5 seconds and occurs about 4-5 times a day.  Is this the early stages of Parkinson's or MS?  I am going to the doctor this week and want to know what I should ask to test for.
title: Lower cheek/upper lip twitch
